Producer: Martin Mathieu, Jason Ninness, Sheldon Wilson
Synopsis: Following a rash of mysterious disappearances, a naked teenage boy (Rocky Marquette) covered in blood suddenly appears outside the police station brandishing a gore-spattered hunting knife. Believing him to be involved somehow in the disappearances, Sheriff Jack Sheppard (Timothy V. Murphy) and his partner, Laura Russell (Lindsey Stoddart), take the boy into custody and interrogate him. When the boy starts talking, however, Sheppard's whole world begins to collapse around him.
Title: Shallow Ground
